alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 18 at 2:58AM CDT until March 19 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Snow accumulations of up to 4 to 6 inches. Up to 8 inches possible for mountain peaks and the Chisos Basin. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph in the higher elevations. * WHERE...Central Brewster County, and Chisos Basin. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for heavy snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Significant amounts of snow are forecast that will make travel dangerous. Only travel in an emergency. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452- 9292.
